title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 263.8 - City of Yonkers earnings tax returns for nonresident individuals under a disability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 263.8 - City of Yonkers earnings tax returns for nonresident individuals under a disability

State Regulations

Tax Law, § 8(d) of § 1340(c); Codes and Ordinances of the

City of Yonkers, § 92-105(d)

The City of Yonkers earnings tax return required for an
individual who is unable to make a return by reason of minority, insanity or
other disability must be made and filed by such individual's guardian, committee, fiduciary or other person charged with the care of such individual's
person or property (other than a receiver in possession of only part of such
individual's property), or by his duly authorized agent. In such a case, the
fiduciary or other person charged with the care of such individual's person or
property is liable for the City of Yonkers earnings tax. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§
263.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
